oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Piet Lynx gives words in his language to Lucy Lloyd in Mowbray, often providing plural and singular declensions. There are sometimes additional columns on the opposite pages, most notably when vocabulary is supplied by Sila, |han=kass'o and Piet Lynx.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by Piet Lynx
